import { Button, Form, Icon, Message, Grid, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const SignupComponent = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', error: '', loading: false, message: '', showForm: true, ticked: true }) const { name, email, password, error, loading, message, showForm, ticked } = values const headerStyle = { textAlign: 'center' } const subHeaderStyle = { paddingLeft: 30, paddingRight: 30, paddingTop: 15, color: 'grey' } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.table({ name, email, password, error, loading, message, showForm, ticked }) } const handleChange = name => (e) => { setValues({...values, error: false, [name]: e.target.value}) } const handleTicked = () => (e) => { setValues({ ticked: e.target.checked }) } return (
Comics Ghor A Canvas to Paint Your Mind Out Welcome to Comics Ghor, a Bangladeshi website. The purpose of Comics Ghor is to create a free platform for all the Bangladeshi people, of all age, who desire to draw comics or write novels, stories or more.
Already signed up? Sign In here instead.
) } export default SignupComponent;
